stories.text:
Hi HN,

I hope this is the right place to post.

I am looking for calls with people in VFX about machine learning..

The conversation will be up to the person but I'd love to talk about previous experience with it (if any), existing use cases like rotoscoping, paint outs/wire removal and also the possibilities in the future of it.

For transparency I've designed technical workflows from camera to post for several years and I'm interested in launching a startup using machine learning to accelerate the VFX workflow.

If you are a VFX artist/editor, coordinator or related we would love to have a chat.

To sweeten the deal and make this feel less spammy.. anyone who books a meeting for the weekend will be entered for a prize draw of a £50 amazon gift card, get early access to the platform when it goes live, and get some free processing minutes.

https://koalendar.com/e/machine-learning-in-vfx (The link to book in is in hyperlinked in comments too)

Thanks.
